Articles.Content:
Found a strange bug in RO today. My rocket slowly ascends at a speed of 0.2m/s surface speed, even with the engines off. With the engines on, the speed does not change, even with launch clamps attached. Would anybody mind helping me fix this?

MODS:

https://gyazo.com/9a1b529b58b515d8b58fd8c67ee17507

https://gyazo.com/901424f8a47fbcd19baa405c32954b5b

PC SPECS:

https://gyazo.com/c36c7b196fb9c2addc24a26bd1b6473c

Lenovo Z50-75, Windows 10 Home edition, Manufacturer: Lenovo

FLIGHT LOG:

https://gyazo.com/b6ce9644c0224fc3f9d05679bc5478ea

DEBUG LOG:

https://gyazo.com/2593934dc2c2f04a52f4be0a27c31878

https://gyazo.com/e76020d04d9e452f1dd91423ba873a02
Are you using tweakscaled fins with FAR enabled. That may be the problem
